articles.title: Rashad ber om ursäkt för stöd för Cosby
articles.description: Phylicia Rashad, som spelade Bill Cosbys fru i den populära tv-serien "The Cosby show", ber nu i ett brev om ursäkt för den entusiasm hon visat över att Cosby
articles.content: Phylicia Rashad, som är ny dekan på universitetet Howard, har skickat ut ett brev till studenter och föräldrar där hon ber om ursäkt för det Twitterinlägg hon lade ut i samband med att skådespelaren Bill Cosby släpptes fri ur fängelset den 30 juni, e... [994 chars]

articles.title: Sydney COVID cases expected to decline, London to Australia flights hit $38,000 after cap slashed
articles.description: More supermarkets and trains have been exposed to COVID in NSW, as government and health authorities express optimism that Sydney’s lockdown may still be lifted at the end of Friday, July 9.
articles.content:
Airlines have been warned against profiteering from desperate, stranded Australians trying to get home before passenger arrival caps are halved in 11 days time, amid warnings that some carriers could stop passenger flights to Australia altogether.

articles.title: Gov’t watching health workers after foiled vaccine sale try
articles.description: After busting a ring selling slots in the inoculation queues of local governments, authorities are also now watching health workers after a Manila City nurse was arrested for trying to illegally sell 300 COVID-19 vaccine doses.
articles.content:
MANILA, Philippines — After busting a ring selling slots in the inoculation queues of local governments, authorities are also now watching health workers after a Manila City nurse was arrested for trying to illegally sell 300 COVID-19 vaccine doses.

articles.title: स्वित्झर्लंडने संधी दवडली!
articles.description: झेरदान शाकिरीने ६८व्या मिनिटाला स्वित्झर्लंडला बरोबरी साधून दिली होती.
articles.content: तब्बल ४३ मिनिटे १० जणांसह लढा देत बलाढ्य स्पेनला १-१ असे बरोबरीत रोखल्यानंतर गोलरक्षक यान सोम्मेरने केलेल्या शानदार कामगिरीनंतरही स्वित्झर्लंडला युरो चषक फुटबॉल स्पर्धेत पहिल्यांदा उपांत्य फेरी गाठण्यात अपयश आले. पेनल्टी-शूटआऊटपर्यंत रंगलेल्या उत्कंठ... [1061 chars]

articles.title: Resultado Ucrania vs Inglaterra: 0-4 por cuartos de final de Eurocopa 2021
articles.description: La selección ucraniana no fue rival para el poderío inglés, que se impuso con tantos de Harry Kane (2), Harry Maguire y Jordan Henderson para clasificar a semifinales de la Eurocopa.
articles.content: Ucrania se despidió del sueño de la Eurocopa 2021 luego de caer goleada 4-0 ante Inglaterra en los cuartos de final. Harry Kane (3′ y 50′, Harry Maguire (46′) y Jordan Henderson (63′) sellaron el triunfo de los ingleses en el Estadio Olímpico de Roma... [10532 chars]

articles.description: England viste at de mener alvor i dette mesterskapet, etter at de knuste Ukraina.
articles.content:
